Articles.Content:
First of all, go to http://www.drawball.com

Interesting little site, no? It's been around for quite a while. A massively multiplayer whiteboard where each "player" gets a very limited supply of ink per day.

It's a huge drawing surface too, and you zoom in multiple levels to get down to where you're actually drawing stuff.

So I figured I'd post this here just to put feelers out, see how many people would be interested in trying to do something Kerbal-themed with Drawball. Some kind of simple drawing that anybody can help to donate ink towards, and the more people we get, the bigger the drawing can be, and the longer we can keep it up there against the other players.
Considering the comments in the chat there, I think I'll pass.
it's an easy way to cause some other forum to raid these forums thats for sure.
